string.name: whats_new_text
string.translation_description: Description of new features in this version in html

resources.string:
New in version %s

\t • Added Comet Leonard which will be visible through binoculars for a few days around Christmas
\t • Major re-working and simplification of the code - this should allow more features to be added in the future!
\t • Persian Translations (Credit: MLDFRJDN)
\t • Assorted other translation fixes (e.g. credit VegaDark for Spanish, Aga-C for Polish, VasilisKos for Greek, FTNo for Norwegian and more.
